column4: ï»¿P3 running at 450 mhz with 512 mb ram-  what Linux would you recommend?  Xubuntu? Or Another?
Eh, it would run okay, not brilliantly, but better than it would under Gnome or KDE. I don't want to go off-topic, but there are lots of other minimalistic distros you could try too.
I like Puppy Linux. It initially runs off CD, but you can configure it to run a session from a single file, so that's kind of cool.
